name: CityMint
overview:
Order food from local restaurants right from your iPhone with no price markup.

Currently available in New York City and San Francisco. More Cities and an Android app coming soon!

Details:

CityMint is a location based app that offers a menu and ordering system for restaurants through your iPhone. You can search for restaurants by current location, address, cuisine, or available menu items. Look at detailed menus from eateries in your city, choose what to order, make special requests (e.g. â€œExtra Spicy pleaseâ€), and complete the transaction for delivery â€“ all with a few taps and right in the app.

Latest News:

  • Order to your bar stool: Check into a bar that allows food delivery and order with a few simple clicks straight to your bar stool. No need to leave the bar to get food or go outside to place the call.
  • Order to your hotel room: Travelers beware. We have the best alternative to overpriced room service. Check into any hotel in NYC and SF and order from restaurants to have food delivered straight to your room. Easy as pie - pizza pie that is :-)

v2.0 Features:

  • Saved Credit Card - Tired of entering the same info again? Save frequently used cards and pay for your order without digging out your wallet.
  • Favorites List - Eat here a lot? Save favorite restaurants and menu items for one-touch ordering.
  • YELP! Integration â€“ Not quite sure about that Thai food spot? Check the #1 place for user reviews to learn more.
  • Easy Sign-Up â€“ Get started and on your way to that first meal in less time!
  • Faster Interface - A faster app means less time searching and ordering.

via: CityMint
